directions: In cocktail shaker, muddle mint sprigs, candied ginger, simple syrup, and lime juice. Add gin, ginger beer, and ice, and shake vigorously. Fill highball glass with three or four large ice cubes. Pour in drink and garnish with mint and candied ginger.
ingredients: 1 small piece candied ginger (about 1 inch in diameter), thinly sliced
2 ounces gin (such as Plymouth or Tanqueray)
Garnish: fresh mint sprigs and candied ginger
title: Ginger Mule
